text: Saffron Walden is a town near the M11 motorway, in the Uttlesford district of Essex. It is a market town north of Bishop's Stortford, south of Cambridge and north of London. It has a rural appearance and some buildings of the medieval period. The population was 15,504 at the 2011 census. == References == Category:Towns in Essex Category:Uttlesford
title: Saffron Walden
